column2: To announce that there must be no criticism of the president, or that we are to stand by the president right or wrong, is not only unpatriotic and servile, but is morally treasonable to the American public.
Violence is the last refuge of the incompetant.

As democracy is perfected, the office of president represents, more and more closely, the inner soul of the people. On some great and glorious day the plain folks of the land will reach their heart's desire at last and the White House will be adorned by a downright moron.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
If ever time should come, when vain and aspiring men shall possess the highest seats in Government, our country will stand in need of its experienced patriots to prevent its ruin.
The liberties of a people never were, nor ever will be, secure, when the transactions of their rulers may be concealed from them.
America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves.
No one ever became poor underestimating the intelligence of the American consumer.
Not all conservatives are stupid people, but I have found that most stupid people are conservative.
We’ll know that our disinformation campaign has worked when everything the American public believes is false.
We can either have democracy in this country or we can have great wealth concentrated in the hands of a few, but we cannot have both.
A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pant on.
Gay Marriage isn't Special Rights, it's Equal Rights. Special Rights are for political churches that don't pay taxes.

Perhaps the fact that we have seen millions voting themselves into complete dependence on a tyrant has made our generation understand that to choose one's government is not necessarily to secure freedom.
The sovereign is called a tyrant who knows no laws but his caprice.
This, to me, is the ultimately heroic trait of ordinary people; they say no to the tyrant and they calmly take the consequences of this resistance.
If you have an important point to make, don’t try to be subtle or clever. Use a pile driver. Hit the point once. Then come back and hit it again. Then hit it a third time - a tremendous whack!
